item.description:
Come and spend a day learning about and connecting with the elemental spirits of the four elements: Air, Fire, Earth and Water.

We will physically experience each element, and have a lecture and discussion about each one.

You will learn to cal to them and ask them to lend their energies, and connect with them intimately through a guided meditation for each one.

Finally we will offer our thanks, and give an offering to each direction.

Class will be from 11:00 am- 4:00 pm

$25.00 per person, lunch will be included at 1:00 pm

(variety of sandwiches homemade chicken, ham & cheese,tuna & egg salad, chips and pickle, dessert on 2nd break :) If you dont want the provided lunch, the class will be $20.00.

Cash or checks will be accepted the day of the class

Please dress comfortably, with good walking shoes as we will be taking a walk through

the woods to a waterfall.
item.how_to_find_us: Park across the street at Martin Tool and come in the Garage or porch door :)
item.why: The elements are around us and a part of us, and by connecting with them it will help to bring you to a higher spiritual understanding....
item.name: Connecting With The Spirits of the Earth
